channel.title: blog on aonemd
channel.description: Recent content in blog on aonemd

item.title: Introducing Jack and a New Dark Theme
item.description: This website is generated by Jekyll, the static site generator. For compiling assets (mainly Javascript and stylsheet files), I’ve been using Sprockets through Jekyll Assets gem. Although recently, and after I had updated the gems in Jekyll’s Gemfile, a new update for Jekyll asset was pushed. It appears they decided to change their entire interface. This rendered my whole project unusable and I needed to change every call to Jekyll Assets new interface in order to fix it.
